Flub.Name: Strength
Flub.Description: The amount of stratification to be applied. Low values produce more strata, with fractured, delicate substrata; high values produce stronger, larger strata.

Flub.Name: Substrata
Flub.Description: At non-zero values, this setting creates a secondary level of stratification between the first level of stratification for added detail.

Flub.Name: Filtered
Flub.Description: When ON, creates smoother curvature for the plates.
